entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Val-des-Monts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow or rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of light snow in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
